title: Pacman
body: Remake of the classic arcade game of Pacman. This windows application is fully tested with NUnit and written in C#. It emulated the original Pacman games where ghosts will chase you around the playing board.

title: Fishy
body: You are a little fish minding your own business swimming around the sea, but in order to survive you must eat other fish! Be aware, you may only eat fish that are small than yourself. Larger fish will eat you up, so you must avoid them at all costs!

title: Chitter Challenge
body: A Twitter clone that will allow the users to post messages to a public board. You are able to reply and like other peoples comments. This is written in Ruby and uses the Sinatra web framework to host the pages.

title: Treasure Hunt
body: A mobile phone application project using augmented reality where the user has to navigate the real world on a treasure hunt. You are given clues on where to find the next point on your treasure map. The application uses GPS to let the user know how far away from each point they are. The mobile application is written in C#, Ruby, JavaScript, Swift and Unity.

title: Bowling Challenge
body: A web page application to display bowling scores. The user can either enter their own score or randomise a result. The web application is written in Javascript and JQuery.

title: Instagram Challenge
body: A remake of Instagram where the user can sign up via FaceBook and post their favourite images that will get stored on AWS. Other users can like and comment on your images. This web application is written in Ruby and JavaScript.

title: Battle
body: A web application for a two player battle style game using Javascript and JQuery.

title: Portfolio
body: A portfolio site with information about my career, education and experiences, written in React, TypeScript, SCSS and PHP.
